import { useState } from "react" import SignInForm from "../../components/sign-in-form-ant" import SignUpForm from "../../components/sign-up-form-ant" import landingImg from "../../assets/images/landing-img.jpeg" import logo from "../../assets/images/dbs-logo.png" import "./auth-page.css" const AuthPage = () => { const [pageMode, setPageMode] = useState("sign-in") return (

Welcome to DBS Seed

Please enter your login credentials to access your account, or sign up for a new account.

{ setPageMode("sign-in") }} className={`ap-form-option ${pageMode === "sign-in" && "active"}`}> Sign In
{ setPageMode("sign-up") }} className={`ap-form-option ${pageMode === "sign-up" && "active"}`}> Sign Up
{/* Form Section Here */} {pageMode === "sign-in" && } {pageMode === "sign-up" && }

) } export default AuthPage
